user_question: What are the most unusual courses offered at universities around the world?
final_answer: Some of the most unusual courses offered at universities include 'The Science of Harry Potter' at Frostburg State University, 'Tree Climbing' at Cornell University, 'The Art of Walking' at Centre College, and 'Underwater Basket Weaving' at Reed College.
